name: Phantom[SHOCKER]
description:
Phantom[SHOCKER]

A game not really filled with adventure.

Made with an art pack from @KennyNL

The Ghost Army has stolen your body, fight through them to get it back!

Follow me on Twitter if you like the game: @DS8KUHD

I don't expect anyone to pay for my first game that I've posted online, but it took 17.5 hours to make, so if you don't pay please follow me ^^^.
